mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM `team_applications` AS a JOIN `team_recruitments` AS t ON(a.team_no = t.team_no) WHERE t.username = #{username} ORDER BY upd_date DESC
SELECT a.*,t.title AS teamTitle FROM `team_applications` AS a JOIN `team_recruitments` AS t ON (a.team_no = t.team_no) WHERE a.username = #{username} ORDER BY upd_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `team_applications` (team_no, title, phone, username, band_name, content, upd_date, approval_status, deposit_status) VALUES (#{teamNo}, #{title}, #{phone}, #{username}, #{bandName}, #{content}, now(), 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE `team_applications` SET approval_status = 2 WHERE deposit_status <> 1 AND team_no = #{teamNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `team_applications` WHERE team_no = #{teamNo} AND deposit_status = 1 ORDER BY upd_date DESC
